parameters.name: AclId
parameters.description: The ID of the associated ACL.

parameters.name: AclStatus
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable access control lists (ACLs). Valid values:

*   **on**
*   **off**

parameters.name: AclType
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable ACLs. Valid values:

*   **white**: a whitelist. IPv6 addresses in the ACL are allowed to access backend services.
*   **black**: a blacklist. IPv6 addresses in the ACL are not allowed to access backend services.

parameters.name: AllocateIpv6Port
parameters.description: The port that is used by the IPv6 address allocated to the IPv6 Translation Service instance.

parameters.name: BackendIpv4Addr
parameters.description: The public IPv4 address that needs to provide IPv6 services.

parameters.name: BackendIpv4Port
parameters.description: The port of the public IPv4 address that needs to provide IPv6 services.

parameters.name: EntryBandwidth
parameters.description:
The maximum bandwidth specified in the IPv6 mapping entry. Valid values:

*   \-1 (default): does not limit the maximum bandwidth specified in the IPv6 mapping entry.
*   1 to 200: the bandwidth value specified in the IPv6 mapping entry. Unit: Mbit/s.

> The sum of the maximum bandwidth values specified in all IPv6 entries cannot exceed the maximum bandwidth supported by the instance.

parameters.name: EntryDescription
parameters.description: The description of the IPv6 mapping entry.

parameters.name: EntryName
parameters.description: The name of the IPv6 mapping entry. It must be 2 to 100 characters in length and can contain letters, digits, periods (.), underscores (\_), and hyphens (-). It must start with a letter. It cannot start with `http://` or `https://`.

parameters.name: Ipv6TranslatorId
parameters.description: The ID of the IPv6 Translation Service instance.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region of the IPv6 Translation Service instance. You can call the **DescribeRegions** operation to query the most recent region list.
